Deploy Guide

2025-09-05

Source: vignettes/deployment_guide.Rmd
deployment_guide.Rmd

Work In Progress!…

Quick Start

To add a new assessment to hera package install hera package

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("aquaMetrics/hera", dependencies = TRUE)
library(hera)
  1. Open a new File > New File > R Markdown
  2. Select ‘From Template’
  3. Search for ‘Deployment Template’ and open
  4. Change the ‘Deployment Template’ title to match your assessment name
  5. Save the document

Congratulations! You now have a new deployment template ready to populate.

Next, complete the following sections to get your assessment fully operational!
